WizardTD.UiObject

类 UI

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.UiObject.UI
  • 直接已知子类:
    AccelerateUI, BuidUI, DamageUI, ManaUI, PauseUI, RangeUI, SpeedUI

    public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected boolean contain
      A flag indicating whether the UI contains a particular point.
      protected int height
      The height of the UI.
      protected int width
      The width of the UI.
      protected int x
      The x-coordinate of the UI's position.
      protected int y
      The y-coordinate of the UI's position.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      UI(int x, int y)
      Constructs a new UI object with the specified coordinates.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void contain(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Determines if the UI contains a given point specified by mouse coordinates.
      abstract boolean getcotain()
      Checks if the UI contains the specified point.
      abstract int getheight()
      Gets the height of the UI.
      abstract int getwidth()
      Gets the width of the UI.
      abstract int getx()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the UI's position.
      abstract int gety()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the UI's position.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        The width of the UI.

        A flag indicating whether the UI contains a particular point.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • UI

        public UI(int x,
          int y)
        Constructs a new UI object with the specified coordinates.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the UI element.
        y - The y-coordinate of the UI element.

    • 方法详细资料

      • contain

        public abstract void contain(int mouseX,
                             int mouseY)
        Determines if the UI contains a given point specified by mouse coordinates.
        参数:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse.

      • getx

        public abstract int getx()
        Gets the x-coordinate of the UI's position.
        返回:
        The x-coordinate.

      • gety

        public abstract int gety()
        Gets the y-coordinate of the UI's position.
        返回:
        The y-coordinate.

      • getwidth

        public abstract int getwidth()
        Gets the width of the UI.
        返回:
        The width.

      • getheight

        public abstract int getheight()
        Gets the height of the UI.
        返回:
        The height.

      • getcotain

        public abstract boolean getcotain()
        Checks if the UI contains the specified point.
        返回:
        true if the UI contains the point, false otherwise.
